msg: (svn_diff__tree_insert_token): Fix the cause of a segfault.

author: brane
msg: This could never have worked, because we don't build libexpat until after

author: gstein
msg: Update the test output for 'svn --help' to compensate for the recent
changes. Specifically, 'svn --help' now prints help on all-commands,
rather than help on the 'help' command.
Problem discovered by C. Mike Pilato <cmpilato@collab.net>

author: cmpilato
msg: Finish (I *think*) the task of supporting disjoint working copy items
during updates and switches.  This is related to revisions 1726-28 and
(send_vsn_url): Use get_from_path_map to find the real path.
(dav_svn__update_report): Add linked paths to a special path map
hash.  Modify usage of `dst_path'.  Updated call to svn_repos_begin_report.
(reporter_link_path): Doh.  Need to send leading slash on linkpath args.
(svn_repos_link_path): Only use second txn for updates, not switches.
(svn_repos_finish_report): Calculate target path when none is given.
(replace_file_or_dir): Oh my gosh.  Switch order of source and
target parameters -- thankfully nobody is using "switch" yet...
(delta_files): Don't get a delta stream if it won't get used.
(verify_update): New, created from most of the guts of run_and_verify_update.
(run_and_verify_update): Move the verification part of this to verify_update.
